a:s.a:s: /* * Library: IMMZD2DTMeningococcalMenCLogic (IMMZ.D2.DT.Meningococcal.Monovalent MenC conjugate vaccine) * Rule: Determine if the client is due for a meningococcal vaccination according to the national immunization schedule * Decision Table: Monovalent MenC conjugate vaccine schedule * Trigger: IMMZ.D2 Determine required vaccination(s) if any */ library IMMZD2DTMeningococcalMenCLogic

def.name: Today
Patient
Patient

def.name: Client is not due for meningococcal vaccination Guidance

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Client is not due for meningococcal vaccination Guidance

a:t.name: guidance
a:t.value: Should not vaccinate client with first meningococcal dose as client's age is under 2 months. Check for any vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the first dose.

a:t.name: guidance
a:t.value: Should not vaccinate client with second meningococcal dose as the latest meningococcal dose was administered less than 2 months ago. Check for any vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the second dose.

a:t.name: guidance
a:t.value: Should not vaccinate client with meningococcal booster dose as the latest meningococcal dose was administered less than 1 year ago. Check for any vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the booster dose.

def.name: Client is due for meningococcal vaccination Guidance

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Client is due for meningococcal vaccination Guidance

a:t.name: guidance
a:t.value: Should vaccinate client with first meningococcal dose as no meningococcal dose was administered and client is within appropriate age range. Check for contraindications.

a:t.name: guidance
a:t.value: Should vaccinate client with second meningococcal dose as client was less than 11 months when primary series was started and latest meningococcal dose was administered more than 2 months ago. Check for contraindications.

def.name: Meningococcal immunization schedule is complete Guidance

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Meningococcal immunization schedule is complete Guidance

a:t.name: guidance
a:t.value: Meningococcal immunization schedule is complete as client's age was more than 11 months when primary series was started. One primary series dose was administered. Check for any other vaccines due.

a:t.name: guidance
a:t.value: Meningococcal immunization schedule is complete. Two primary series doses and one booster dose were administered. Check for any vaccines due.

a:s.a:s: 'Meningococcal immunization schedule is complete as client\'s age was more than 11 months when primary series was started. One primary series dose was administered. Check for any other vaccines due.'

then.value: Meningococcal immunization schedule is complete. Two primary series doses and one booster dose were administered. Check for any vaccines due.

a:s.a:s: "Client is not due for meningococcal vaccination Case 1"
'Should not vaccinate client with first meningococcal dose as client\'s age is under 2 months. Check for any vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the first dose.'
"Client is due for meningococcal vaccination Case 1"
'Should vaccinate client with first meningococcal dose as no meningococcal dose was administered and client is within appropriate age range. Check for contraindications.'
"Client is not due for meningococcal vaccination Case 2"

'Should not vaccinate client with second meningococcal dose as the latest meningococcal dose was administered less than 2 months ago. Check for any vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the second dose.'
"Client is due for meningococcal vaccination Case 2"

'Should vaccinate client with second meningococcal dose as client was less than 11 months when primary series was started and latest meningococcal dose was administered more than 2 months ago. Check for contraindications.'
'Meningococcal immunization schedule is complete as client\'s age was more than 11 months when primary series was started. One primary series dose was administered. Check for any other vaccines due.'
"Client is not due for meningococcal vaccination Case 3"

'Should not vaccinate client with meningococcal booster dose as the latest meningococcal dose was administered less than 1 year ago. Check for any vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the booster dose.'
"The primary series is complete. Client is due for meningococcal booster dose"

'Should vaccinate client with Meningococcal booster dose as no meningococcal booster dose was administered and the latest meningococcal dose was administered more than 1 year ago. Check for contraindications.'
'Meningococcal immunization schedule is complete. Two primary series doses and one booster dose were administered. Check for any vaccines due.'
